calendar.title: Concert with Anisimova/Palmer Duo
calendar.venue:
Gibson Center For The Arts
Chester, Maryland USA
calendar.description: As part of its 2018-2019 Premier Artists lineup, the Washington College Concert Series presents Tanya Anisimova, cello and Matt Palmer, guitar. Special opening performance by The Eastern Shore Guitar Festival Orchestra!

calendar.title: Arts on the Green - Tanya Anisimova
calendar.description:
Arts on the Green welcomes internationally-known musician and Kentlands resident, Tanya Anisimova to the stage for a dazzling evening of music to launch the new performing arts season. Tanya reveals the magic of the cello with her solo program. Be moved and amazed by music from the Renaissance to the Contemporary, including well-known favorites, original compositions and Kodaly's celebrated sonata Opus 8. Participate in the performance as Tanya improvises on spontaneous themes from the audience.

This special evening begins with a sunset wine tasting provided by The Wine Harvest in the new Kentlands Mansion Garden at 7 p.m.; walk the few steps over to the Arts Barn’s historic theater for the dynamic concert at 8 p.m.; and top off the evening with the artist meet and greet and chocolate tasting by local chocolatier, SPAGnVOLA downstairs in the Arts Barn Gallery.

calendar.title: Wensleydale Concert Series - 2018
calendar.description:
Recital with pianist Daniel Grimwood.

Felix Mendelssohn - D Major Sonata for cello and piano
Tanya Anisimova – Farela
Sergei Rachmaninoff - Sonata for piano & cello

calendar.description:

Zoltán Kodály - Sonata Op. 8
Marin Marais - La Folia
JS Bach - Chaconne (from Violin Partita No.2 in D minor)

calendar.title: Promisek Salon Concert - FaReLa Duo
calendar.venue:
Promisek At Three Rivers Farm
Bridgewater, Connecticut USA
calendar.description: Tanya Anisimova, cello and Pi-Hsun Shih, piano. Excerpts from Sonata No. 3 in A Major, Op. 69 by Ludwig van Beethoven and Fa-Re-La for Cello and piano (2015) by Tanya Anisimova.
